item.title: Determine the Best Database and Cloud Hosting Solution for Your Next Application
item.description: When it comes to setting up a killer app or website on WordPress, one of the big decisions you gotta make is about where your data’s gonna live.

item.title: Introduction to Relational Databases and RDBMSs
item.description: In the tech world, data is everything. Apps, websites, and even your favorite video games need somewhere to store and access their data.

item.title: What is MariaDB?
item.description: What Makes NoSQL Different From SQL?The term “NoSQL” or “non-SQL” describes a database management system with a non-relational data model, in contrast to the Structured Query Language (SQL).

item.title: What is MySQL?
item.description: What Makes NoSQL Different From SQL?The term “NoSQL” or “non-SQL” describes a database management system with a non-relational data model, in contrast to the Structured Query Language (SQL).

item.title: What is NoSQL?
item.description: What Makes NoSQL Different From SQL? NoSQL, standing for either “not only SQL” or “non-SQL,” steps into the database scene like the cool new kid on the block, offering a different way to handle data compared to the traditional SQL databases.
